movies.name: Donnie Darko
movies.description: An intriguing psychological thriller directed by Richard Kelly. It follows the life of Donnie, a troubled teenager experiencing temporal phenomena and getting entangled in a surreal plot.

movies.name: Gone Girl
movies.description: A dark thriller directed by David Fincher, depicting the disappearance of Amy and the subsequent media attention. It explores the nuances of what initially appears to be a perfect marriage.

movies.name: Inception
movies.description: An innovative sci-fi thriller directed by Christopher Nolan. It delves into the invasion of dreams, taking the audience through layers of reality.

movies.name: Kill Bill Volume 1
movies.description: An explosive revenge odyssey directed by Quentin Tarantino, starring Uma Thurman. It features a unique blend of martial arts, stylized violence, and cinematic homages.

movies.name: Leaving Las Vegas
movies.description: is a poignant drama that delves into the harrowing journey of Ben Sanderson, a deeply troubled alcoholic portrayed by Nicolas Cage. Set against the vibrant yet decadent backdrop of Las Vegas, the film explores themes of addiction, despair, and an unconventional human connection.

movies.name: Oldboy
movies.description: A striking South Korean thriller directed by Park Chan-wook. It follows the story of a man mysteriously released after 15 years of confinement, triggering an obsessive quest for revenge with shocking twists and visually stunning direction.
